meanings.definition: A sheet of paper with questions or exercises for students to complete.
meanings.sent1: The teacher handed out worksheets for us to practice math problems.
meanings.sent2: Students need to complete their worksheets before the end of class.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled my juice on the worksheet, making it a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a worksheet of memories, neatly organized and ready to be revisited.
meanings.sent5: The worksheet was filled with challenging questions that made us think hard.

meanings.definition: A set of questions or exercises for students to complete.
meanings.sent1: Completing worksheets helps students understand the lesson better.
meanings.sent2: The teacher prepared a new set of worksheets for the upcoming test.
meanings.sent3: My brother thought the worksheet was a puzzle and tried to solve it backwards.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to finish the worksheet was like a marathon runner reaching the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The worksheet contained a mix of easy and difficult questions to challenge the students.

meanings.definition: A tool used for organizing and analyzing data in a spreadsheet program.
meanings.sent1: The accountant used the worksheets to create detailed financial reports.
meanings.sent2: Excel is a popular software for creating and managing worksheets.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally deleted the wrong worksheet and lost all my data!
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a worksheet, neatly arranging thoughts and ideas into categories.
meanings.sent5: The worksheet allowed us to input data and generate graphs for analysis.
